text: Lewis Collins (26 May 1946 â€“ 27 November 2013)"Happy Birthday Richard Hastilow, 65", The Times, 26 May 2010 was an English actor. He was best known for his tough-guy role as Bodie in the ITV drama series The Professionals. It ran from 1977 to 1983. Collins died from cancer in Los Angeles, California on 27 November 2013, aged 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * *The Unofficial Lewis Collins website Category:1946 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Cheshire Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Birkenhead
title: Lewis Collins
